page.title: 13Greenwich Hospital.
page.content: Greenwich Hospital is kept in very good order.Every morning the hospital is cleaned from top to bottom.All the nurses are very helpful and very loving with the old people. when someone is rushedin from an accident they always know what to do and thay dont panic. There are escalators going from each floor, so you dont have to climb hundreds of stairs.also there is a tiny little chapel the hospital. its a very nice chapel and the priest who says the mass is nice too. when i had to go to greenwich hospital because i fell over i,was pretty scared because i,ve never liked hospitals.When i got there all the nurses made me welcome and comfortable. They looked after me pretty well because i don,t like being alone.Evey morning i was the first person awake.A teacher came in every morning
